EmailTemplate.description: Competition: Account 10 Year Thank you for entering
EmailTemplate.name: Competition: Account 10 Year Thank you for entering (IContact)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for entering the “Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa” giveaway
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName},
Thank you for entering the “Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa” competition with Safari365.
Winners will be announced on the 21st November 2016.
Good luck from all of us at Safari365!
